definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Entry form will be destroyed before the commencement of next Music Festival.
sentences.chinese: 報名表將於來屆音樂節開始前銷燬。

sentences.english: And we had competitions and choir and music every year.
sentences.chinese: 並且我們每年都會有比賽，合唱團和其他音樂節目。

sentences.english: Beijing new generation on Beijing modern sky music festival.
sentences.chinese: 北京摩登天空音樂節上的北京青年一代。

sentences.english: My school has an excellent music program.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校有很棒的音樂節目。

sentences.english: I don't like pop music shows or cookery programmes.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡流行音樂節目和烹飪節目。

sentences.english: It's like Bluegrass Festival, things like that, so yeah.
sentences.chinese: 那個跟藍草音樂節很像。

sentences.english: They'll be the talk of the festival.
sentences.chinese: 他們會成爲整個音樂節的熱門話題。

sentences.english: On the east coast, it is probably the biggest bluegrass festival.
sentences.chinese: 在東海岸，這可能是規模最大的蘭草音樂節。

sentences.english: We are on the road from Kazan to the Grushinski Festival.
sentences.chinese: 我們在從喀山到古辛斯基音樂節的公路上。

sentences.english: Here are the excerpts of some themes. Can you recognize them?
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一些主題音樂節選。你能聽出它們嗎？

sentences.english: The American group also performed at a national music festival.
sentences.chinese: 美國集團還表現在一個國家的音樂節。

sentences.english: Lady Gaga is set to play this year's Glastonbury Festival.
sentences.chinese: 嘉嘉夫人將發揮今年的格拉斯頓伯裏音樂節。

sentences.english: A film festival; a high-school music festival .
sentences.chinese: 爲慶祝音樂節，街道上掛滿了彩旗。
繼伍德斯托克音樂節之後，多個大型集會登場。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
